name: samext
description: This is an extension for Chrome and Brave that enables you to manage your tabs with ease

scripts.compress-samext: npm run compress-popup & npm run compress-background
scripts.build-safari: xcrun safari-web-extension-converter . --app-name 'samext-safari' --bundle-identifier 'co.samser.samext.safari' --macos-only --no-open --force --project-location ./safari-build && cd safari-build && xcodebuild -scheme samext-safari -configuration Release
scripts.release-prep: npm run compress-samext && npm run zip && npm run build-safari

author: Tano Argie
